alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 02 at 5:49AM MST until March 02 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Blowing snow above 4000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Fredonia and Jacob Lake. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 5 AM Today to 8 AM Today: Fredonia 0 inches Jacob Lake 0 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
